easter.name: Easter
easter.description: Easter Sunday is calculated using the Computus formula

christmas.name: Christmas
christmas.description: Christmas is always the 25th day of December

pentecost.name: Pentecost
pentecost.description: Pentecost is 49 days after Easter Sunday, or 7 weeks

lent_start.name: Ash Wednesday
lent_start.description: Lent begins on Ash Wednesday, 46 days before Easter

lent_end.name: Holy Saturday
lent_end.description: Lent ends on Holy Saturday, the day before Easter

holy_week_start.name: Beginning of Holy Week
holy_week_start.description: Holy Week begins on Palm Sunday, 7 days before Easter

maundy_thursday.name: Maundy Thursday
maundy_thursday.description: Maundy Thursday is the thursday of Holy Week

good_friday.name: Good Friday
good_friday.description: Good Friday is the Friday of Holy Week

advent_start.name: Beginning of Advent
advent_start.description: Advent starts on the fourth Sunday before Christmas

trinity_sunday.name: Trinity Sunday
trinity_sunday.description: Trinity Sunday is the first Sunday after Easter

pentecost_end.name: End of Pentecost
pentecost_end.description: Saturday before the start of Advent

all_saints.name: All Saints' Day
all_saints.description: All Saints' Day is always November 1

thanksgiving.name: Thanksgiving
thanksgiving.description: Thanksgiving is the fourth Thursday in November

thanksgiving_ca.name: Thanksgiving CA
thanksgiving_ca.description: Thanksgiving in Canada is the second Monday in October

reformation_day.name: Reformation Day
reformation_day.description: Reformation day is always the last day of October

purification_of_mary_and_presentation_of.name: The Purification of Mary and Presentation of Our Lord
purification_of_mary_and_presentation_of.description: Celebrated on February 2nd, commemorating the presentation of Jesus in the temple

new_years_eve.name: New Year's Eve
new_years_eve.alt_name: Eve of the Circumcision and Name of Jesus
new_years_eve.description: Celebrated on December 31st, the eve of the Circumcision and Name of Jesus

new_years.name: New Year's Day
new_years.description: Celebrated on January 1st, marking the circumcision and naming of Jesus

baptism_of_our_lord.name: The Baptism of Our Lord
baptism_of_our_lord.description: Observed on the first Sunday after Epiphany, commemorating the baptism of Jesus

ascension_of_our_lord.name: The Ascension of Our Lord
ascension_of_our_lord.description: Celebrated 40 days after Easter, commemorating the ascension of Jesus into heaven
